articles.author: Kevin Sullivan, Lori Rozsa
articles.title: DeSantis again says that Blacks benefited from slavery - The Washington Post
articles.description: GOP presidential candidate says the controversial new Florida curriculum has ‘the most robust standards in African American history.’
articles.content:

Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis is intensifying his efforts to de-emphasize racism in his states public school curriculum by arguing that some Black people benefited from be… [+4748 chars]
